title: remember to lock in?
body: the old sistem was better now u get kick out if u dont lock in? so stupid for real and then u lose rank points ? yep this game is getting worst every stupid path. bring the old system back cus this one is shit ty.

replies.body: We all went through the same frustration at first. You'll get used to it eventually and maybe even appreciate the occasion when it makes things go a little smoother too.

So, the system is flawed because you are, for some unknown reason, *incapable* of performing a single mouse click. Which begs the question, how did you make this thread?

Or are you simply trying to come up with some ridiculous excuse for your supreme laziness?
Just lock the hell in. I like the new system get used to it after months of it being live
